duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform scheduled studies and laboratory tests according to established procedures and protocols.
Assist in writing reports and documenting experimental procedures and results.
Follow all laboratory safety procedures and ensure compliance with PSL safety standards.
Demonstrate the ability to safely wear a respirator as required for certain laboratory activities.
Complete additional duties as assigned by laboratory management.

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree or equivalent experience in laboratory or biology is preferred.
